short_summary: General marine work on Canadian Coast Guard ships, St. Lawrence and Great Lakes sectors
description: The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard, requires the services of general marine contractors to perform repair and maintenance on Coast Guard vessels operating in the central and Arctic regions. The contract includes delivery points in Quebec (except city of Quebec) and Ontario (except city of Quebec), and is for a period of three (3) years.",
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title**
--------

* English: General marine work on Canadian Coast Guard ships, St. Lawrence and Great Lakes sectors
* French: Travaux généraux maritimes sur les navires de la Garde Côtière Canadienne, secteurs du St-Laurent et des Grands Lacs

**Tender Reference**
-------------------

* Reference number: WS3437434272-Doc3707424869
* Solicitation number: WS3437434272
* Amendment number: 1

**Notice Details**
-----------------

* Publication date: October 17, 2022
* Tender closing date: November 3, 2022, at 14:00 EDST
* Amendment date: October 18, 2022
* Expected contract start date: December 1, 2022
* Expected contract end date: May 31, 2025

**Contract Details**
-------------------

* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) - Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* End-user entity: Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) - Garde côtière canadienne (GCC)

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* Procurement category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Notice type: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
* Procurement method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest price

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) - Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

**Regions of Opportunity**
-------------------------

* Quebec (except National Capital Region - RCN) - Québec (sauf région de la capitale nationale - RCN)
* Ontario (except National Capital Region - RCN) - Ontario (sauf région de la capitale nationale - RCN)

**Regions of Delivery**
----------------------

* Quebec (except National Capital Region - RCN) - Québec (sauf région de la capitale nationale - RCN)
* Ontario (except National Capital Region - RCN) - Ontario (sauf région de la capitale nationale - RCN)

**Contact Information**
---------------------

* Name: Gabriel Piras (TPSGC/PWGS)
